Package com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.polynomial.api.controllers

Class PolynomialController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.reactorworkshop.polynomial.api.controllers.PolynomialController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/polynomial")
public class PolynomialController
extends Object
    REST controller in charge of evaluating polynomials, finding their roots, extrema, derivatives and integrations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private MultiplePolynomialEvaluationService evaluationService
      Service in charge of non-reactively evaluating multiple trees of polynomial evaluation steps, obtaining their final results and finding their roots, extrema, derivatives and integrations.
      private MultiplePolynomialEvaluationResultDtoFactory factory
      Build DTO instances containing results of requests.
      private ReactiveMultiplePolynomialEvaluationService reactiveEvaluationService
      Service in charge of reactively evaluating multiple trees of polynomial evaluation steps, obtaining their final results and finding their roots, extrema, derivatives and integrations.
      private PolynomialEvaluationResultMapper resultMapper
      Maps polynomial evaluation results between domain and DTO's.
      private EvaluationStepMapper stepMapper
      Maps polynomial evaluation steps between DTO's and domain.
      private PolynomialParametersValidationService validationService
      Service to validate provided input polynomials.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolynomialController

        public PolynomialController​(MultiplePolynomialEvaluationService evaluationService,
                            ReactiveMultiplePolynomialEvaluationService reactiveEvaluationService,
                            PolynomialParametersValidationService validationService,
                            EvaluationStepMapper stepMapper,
                            PolynomialEvaluationResultMapper resultMapper,
                            MultiplePolynomialEvaluationResultDtoFactory factory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        evaluationService - service in charge of non-reactively evaluating polynomials.
        reactiveEvaluationService - service in charge of reactively evaluating polynomials.
        validationService - service to validate order of provided input polynomials.
        stepMapper - maps polynomial evaluation steps from DTO's.
        resultMapper - maps polynomial evaluation results to DTO's.
        factory - builds DTO instances containing results.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateNonReactive

        @PostMapping("/non-reactive")
public MultiplePolynomialEvaluationResultDto evaluateNonReactive​(@RequestBody
                                                                 EvaluationStepsDto steps,
                                                                 @RequestParam(value="delay",required=false)
                                                                 Long delayMillis)
        Evaluates a collection of evaluation steps to compute the final polynomials for each provided step and compute their roots, extrema, derivatives and integrations. This implementation is non reactive. Optionally a delay can be provided between evaluations of different polynomials to observe the impact in performance (used memory, cpu and threads) in the server.
        Parameters:
        steps - a collection containing trees of evaluation steps to obtain polynomials.
        delayMillis - optional amount of delay between polynomials in the collection (expressed in milliseconds).
        Returns:
        results of evaluation.

      • evaluateReactive

        @PostMapping("/reactive")
public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MultiplePolynomialEvaluationResultDto> evaluateReactive​(@RequestBody
                                                                                           EvaluationStepsDto steps,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="delay",required=false)
                                                                                           Long delayMillis)
        Evaluates a collection of evaluation steps to compute the final polynomials for each provided step and compute their roots, extrema, derivatives and integrations. This implementation is reactive. Optionally a delay can be provided between evaluations of different polynomials to observe the impact in performance (used memory, cpu and threads) in the server.
        Parameters:
        steps - a collection containing trees of evaluation steps to obtain polynomials.
        delayMillis - optional amount of delay between polynomials in the collection (expressed in milliseconds).
        Returns:
        results of evaluation.
